conversations.description: User uploads a batch of recent support tickets, then asks the system to run sentiment analysis on them.
Manager requests sentiment scores for chat logs from the last week, filtered by the 'enterprise' segment.
Analyst ingests NPS survey CSV, then triggers aggregation to see month‑over‑month NPS trend.
Support lead asks for a dashboard visualising negative sentiment spikes across product lines.
Agent receives a draft empathetic reply for a ticket flagged with high negative sentiment.
User stores a quarterly insight report and its dashboard link into the company knowledge base.
Regional manager queries sentiment for tickets from APAC region over the past quarter.
Customer success manager requests top three recurring pain points from the aggregated insights.
Product team uploads beta‑test feedback chat transcripts and asks for emotion tagging.
HR analyst ingests employee support tickets and wants sentiment distribution by department.
Executive asks for a dark‑theme dashboard summarising overall sentiment and NPS for the fiscal year.
Support supervisor drafts a response for a ticket with a sentiment score of -0.8 and suggests escalation.
Data scientist requests sentiment analysis on multilingual tickets, specifying language code 'es'.
Operations lead asks to compare sentiment trends before and after a recent product update.
User ingests a mix of ticket, chat, and NPS data, then runs a combined sentiment aggregation.
Marketing manager wants to see sentiment heat‑map for social‑media support interactions.
Customer service director requests a shareable dashboard link to present to stakeholders.
Agent asks for suggested next steps after analyzing a ticket with a neutral sentiment score.
Compliance officer ingests tickets flagged for policy violations and checks sentiment for risk assessment.
Product owner asks the system to highlight emerging negative sentiment keywords in recent chats.
Support analyst drafts an apology email template based on a high‑emotion negative ticket.
Team lead requests sentiment breakdown by support tier (level‑1, level‑2) for the past month.
User uploads a zip file of legacy tickets, then asks for a sentiment trend report spanning two years.
Manager wants a light‑theme dashboard focusing on positive sentiment uplift after a new feature launch.
Customer advocate asks for a summary of top compliments extracted from NPS open‑ended responses.
Support engineer asks for sentiment‑based routing suggestions for new incoming tickets.
Data analyst requests sentiment correlation with ticket resolution time across different regions.
User drafts a response for a ticket with a sentiment score of 0.2, recommending a self‑service article.
Executive asks for a high‑level insight report highlighting quarterly NPS improvement areas.
Product manager queries sentiment for tickets related to a specific feature ID.
Support manager wants to see sentiment trends for tickets filed during peak support hours.
User stores a monthly sentiment insights report and links the associated dashboard for future reference.
Team asks the system to tag emotions (anger, frustration, joy) in live‑chat transcripts for training purposes.
Customer success lead requests a dashboard showing sentiment distribution across subscription plans.
Agent asks for a draft reply to a ticket with mixed sentiment (score 0.1) and asks for a balanced tone.
Analyst ingests a large CSV of NPS survey comments and wants a sentiment heat map by country.
Operations manager asks to aggregate sentiment for tickets marked as 'escalated' in the last 30 days.
User requests a sentiment comparison between two product versions over the same time window.
Support director wants a dashboard illustrating sentiment trends before and after a major outage.
Agent asks the system to suggest a proactive follow‑up action for a ticket with mild negative sentiment.
Product team requests identification of recurring keyword clusters driving negative sentiment.
HR asks for sentiment analysis of internal help‑desk tickets to gauge employee satisfaction.
Executive asks for a concise markdown report summarizing top insights and actionable recommendations.
Support lead ingests a new batch of tickets and wants the system to automatically draft responses for low‑priority items.
Analytics team requests sentiment trend visualization with a custom color palette for brand consistency.
User asks for sentiment scores of tickets filtered by 'free‑tier' customers during a promotional period.
Customer support wants to see a dashboard that highlights sentiment spikes correlated with known bugs.
Manager asks the system to store a daily sentiment snapshot and generate a URL for continuous monitoring.
Agent requests a draft apology and compensation offer for a ticket with a sentiment score of -0.9.
Data scientist asks for sentiment analysis of chat logs in real‑time to trigger alerts for severe negativity.
Product owner wants a report that maps sentiment trends to feature request volumes over time.
Support supervisor asks to generate a dashboard that filters sentiment by support agent performance metrics.
User requests the system to re‑run sentiment analysis after updating the language model for improved accuracy.
Executive asks for a high‑level dashboard preview before publishing the quarterly sentiment report.
Customer experience lead wants to see sentiment distribution across different communication channels.
